name: thely
description: Thely.io JavaScript SDK, allows you to integrate Thely.io into your website or app.
author: ajxb

scripts.prepare:
for file in ./out/index.js ./out/schemas.js ./out/types.js ./out/utils.js ./out/lib/hooks/useInit.js ./out/lib/hooks/useMe.js ./out/lib/hooks/useQuery.js ./out/lib/hooks/useShippingRates.js; do echo "'use client'

" | cat - "$file" > temp && mv temp "$file"; done && git add . && git commit -m 'Adding client-side code' && git push
